actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries for the vessel TRUE BLUE.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries for the vessel TRUE BLUE.
